body.h3: SCENE VII. Field of battle between the camps.

blockquote.i: Alarum. Drums and trumpets. Enter AGRIPPA and others

blockquote.a: Retire, we have engaged ourselves too far:
Caesar himself has work, and our oppression

p.i: Alarums. Enter MARK ANTONY and SCARUS wounded

blockquote.a: O my brave emperor, this is fought indeed!
Had we done so at first, we had droven them home
I had a wound here that was like a T,
We'll beat 'em into bench-holes: I have yet
They are beaten, sir, and our advantage serves
And snatch 'em up, as we take hares, behind:
Once for thy spritely comfort, and ten-fold
For thy good valour. Come thee on.
